00050 #define PCI_BA_CSR  0 /* surely there's an official def ?? WORKTODO */
00051 #define CSR_SIZE    0x80
00052 #define CSR_SIZE_MAX 0x1000
00053 
00054 static int acq200_makeIoMapping(
00055         struct Acq200Device* device, int bar, const char* ident, int len)
00056 // return 0 on success
00057 {
00058 #define BA_MASK PCI_BASE_ADDRESS_MEM_MASK
00059         struct IoMapping* pim = &device->csr;
00060         int rc = 0;
00061 
00062         snprintf(pim->name, sizeof(pim->name), "%s.%s", 
00063                  device->ldev.drv_name, ident);
00064 
00065         pim->pa = pci_resource_start(device->pci_dev, bar)&BA_MASK;
00066         pim->len = len;
00067     
00068         dbg(1, "request_mem_region 0x%08lx %d %s\n", 
00069                 pim->pa, pim->len, pim->name );
00070 
00071         if ( request_mem_region( pim->pa, pim->len, pim->name ) != 0 ){
00072                 pim->va = ioremap_nocache( pim->pa, pim->len );
00073                 dbg(1, "ioremap_nocache pa: 0x%08lx len: 0x%02x va: 0x%p", 
00074                     pim->pa, pim->len, pim->va);
00075         }else{
00076                 dbg( 1, "request_mem_region( 0x%08lx, %d, %s ) failed\n",
00077                             pim->pa, pim->len, pim->name );
00078                 rc = -ENODEV;
00079         }
00080 
00081         return rc;
00082 }
00083 
00084 
00085 int acq200_map_pci_memory(struct Acq200Device* device)
00089 {
00090     int rc = 0;                /* assume success until fail */
00091     
00092     if ( (rc = acq200_makeIoMapping( device, PCI_BA_CSR, "csr", CSR_SIZE)) != 0 ){
00093         return rc;
00094     }
00095     return rc;
00096 }
00097 
00098 static void clearIoMapping(struct IoMapping* iomap)
00099 {
00100     if (iomap->va){
00101         iounmap(iomap->va);
00102     }
00103     if (strlen( iomap->name ) ){
00104         release_mem_region(iomap->pa, iomap->len);
00105     }
00106     memset( iomap, 0, sizeof(struct IoMapping));     
00107 }
00108 
00109 void acq200_unmap_pci_memory( struct Acq200Device* device )
00113 {
00114     clearIoMapping(&device->csr);
00115 }

00117 
00118 static inline int getDirectionFromVma(struct vm_area_struct *vma)
00119 {
00120         int direction;
00121 /* 
00122  * VM_READ: client wants to READ the MAPPING, DMA fills it FROM_DEVICE
00123  * VM_WRITE, client wants to WRITE the MAPPING, DMA write TO_DEVICE
00124  */
00125         switch(vma->vm_flags&(VM_READ|VM_WRITE)){
00126         case VM_READ|VM_WRITE:
00127                 direction = DMA_BIDIRECTIONAL;
00128                 break;
00129         case VM_READ:
00130                 direction = DMA_FROM_DEVICE;
00131                 break;
00132         case VM_WRITE:
00133                 direction = DMA_TO_DEVICE;
00134                 break;
00135         default:
00136                 direction = DMA_NONE;
00137                 break;          
00138         }
00139         return direction;
00140 }

00142 
00143 int acq200_mmap_host(struct file* file, struct vm_area_struct* vma)
00147 {
00148         struct DmaBuf *dma_buf = &PD(vma->vm_file)->dma_buf;
00149         unsigned long vsize = vma->vm_end - vma->vm_start;
00150         unsigned long psize = dma_buf_len(dma_buf);
00151         unsigned pfn = dma_buf->pa >> PAGE_SHIFT;
00152 
00153         dbg(1, "%c vsize %lu psize %lu %s",
00154                 'D', vsize, psize, vsize>psize? "EINVAL": "OK");
00155 
00156         if (vsize > psize){
00157                 return -EINVAL;                   /* request too big */
00158         }
00159         if (remap_pfn_range(
00160                 vma, vma->vm_start, pfn, vsize, vma->vm_page_prot)){
00161                 STATUS;
00162                 return -EAGAIN;
00163         }else{
00164                 STATUS;
00165                 return 0;
00166         }
00167 }
00168 int acq200_mmapAB(struct file* file, struct vm_area_struct* vma)
00172 {
00173         struct Acq200Device* device = DEV(file);
00174 /*
00175         unsigned long off = vma->vm_pgoff << PAGE_SHIFT;
00176 */
00177         unsigned long vsize = vma->vm_end - vma->vm_start;
00178         int ibuf = PD(file)->minor&1;
00179 
00180         struct DmaBuf *dma_buf = &device->AB[ibuf];
00181         unsigned pfn = dma_buf->pa >> PAGE_SHIFT;
00182         unsigned long psize = dma_buf_len(dma_buf);
00183 
00184         dbg(1, "%c vsize %lu psize %lu %s",
00185             ibuf? 'B': 'A', vsize, psize, vsize>psize? "EINVAL": "OK");
00186 
00187         if (vsize > psize){
00188                 return -EINVAL;                   /* request too big */
00189         }
00190         if (remap_pfn_range(
00191                 vma, vma->vm_start, pfn, vsize, vma->vm_page_prot)){
00192                 STATUS;
00193                 return -EAGAIN;
00194         }else{
00195                 STATUS;
00196                 return 0;
00197         }
00198 }
00199 
00200 int acq200_mmap_mbox(struct file* file, struct vm_area_struct* vma)
00204 {
00205         struct Acq200Device* device = DEV(file);
00206         unsigned long off = vma->vm_pgoff << PAGE_SHIFT;
00207         unsigned long pa  = device->csr.pa + off;
00208         unsigned pfn = pa >> PAGE_SHIFT;
00209         unsigned long vsize = vma->vm_end - vma->vm_start;
00210         unsigned long psize = CSR_SIZE_MAX;
00211 
00212         STATUS;
00213 
00214         if (vsize > psize){
00215                 return -EINVAL;                   /* request too big */
00216         }
00217         if (remap_pfn_range(
00218                 vma, vma->vm_start, pfn, vsize, vma->vm_page_prot)){
00219                 STATUS;
00220                 return -EAGAIN;
00221         }else{
00222                 STATUS;
00223                 return 0;
00224         }
00225 }
